Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Conductor's Wax Whistle

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to direct a Kobold Cart towards your target, sending a careening troop that collides with enemies, inflicting 453,673 Physical damage split between enemies impacted.

description: A hero's symbolic trophy, for the kobolds need not be summoned. The kobolds yearn for the catacombs.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.4 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
